dcterms:creator: Kermes, Hannah
Degaetano-Ortlieb, Stefania

dcterms:description: A diachronic corpus of English scientific writing, including texts from the Philosophical Transactions and Proceedings of the Royal Society of London, spanning from 1665 to 1869. It contains metadata and linguistic annotations.
dcterms:title: Royal Society Corpus (RSC)
